summary: At a rural spa, a soldier accidentally cuts his foot on a hairpin. Soon enough he tracks down its lovely owner and finds himself smitten.
cast: Shin'ichi Himori|Kanji Kawahara|Hiroko Kawasaki|Koji Matsumoto|Hideko Mimura|Tsuneo Ohsugi|Chishû Ryû|Tatsuo Saitô|Takeshi Sakamoto|Kinuyo Tanaka|Kayoko Terada|Jun Yokoyama|Munenobu Yui|Masayoshi Ôtsuka
title: Kanzashi
